about:
Quizzers' Club NIT Bhopal, the premier quizzing society at Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology, that aims to polish the brilliance of quizzing for enthusiasts until it dazzles, while demystifying its complexities to ignite a passion for it among newcomers. Founded by a group of quizzing prodigies from MANIT in February 2013, this society is powered by students from diverse fields—quizzers, content writers, bloggers, executives, video editors, photographers, and web developers—who collaborate in nurturing, cultivating, and launching innovative ideas, instilling lifelong skills and values along the way.
The Quizzer's Club MANIT orchestrates a series of intellectually stimulating events such as the Abhigyan, Manthan, Quizzotica, and Vihaan, in addition to a myriad of online quizzing contests. The Inter-City Quizzing Challenge, the pinnacle quizzing event of QCM, unites the nation's sharpest minds in an exhilarating showdown. These competitions attract immense participation from quizzing enthusiasts across various schools and colleges in India, as well as dedicated contenders from within MANIT. In addition to our quizzing events, we present captivating questions, intriguing facts, and diverse aptitudes that weave together immersive and enlightening content. These elements fortify the society's mission to deliver a rich blend of entertainment and education in every facet.

address.college: Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology

eventDetails.title: Inter-City Quizzing Challenge
eventDetails.desc: Madhya Pradesh's largest school quizzing event
eventDetails.content: Instilling enthusiasm and zeal into the atmos of QCM, IQC delves into testing the brightest of minds. Organized over 3 dynamic rounds, the event signifies the celebration of knowledge, sportsmanship and the spirit of camaraderie amongst students of various cities. IQC is indeed an indelible mark on the quizzing landscape of Madhya Pradesh, setting up the spirits of competition even higher. Designed to showcase intellectual prowess and an exhuberance towards learning, the invigorating event also promises gripping rewards and recognition. Step right up to grab a chance to tune into IQC's music of challenges and battles!

eventDetails.title: Flashback Fiesta
eventDetails.content: Flashback fiesta is QCM's one of the most memorable and enjoyable events in Technosearch to check how well spent your childhood was. The event consists of four fun and knowledgeable games oriented toward different nostalgia themes. These events could be attended in groups or individually, according to the game. The winners each time would be shortlisted to play with the other winners to determine the final winner. Join us for a fun-filled event where you can showcase your quizzing skills and knowledge!

eventDetails.title: Anveshan
eventDetails.content: Anveshan'24, organized by Quizzers' Club NIT Bhopal, was an exhilarating event combining intellect and adventure. Participants navigated a series of challenging clues, puzzles, and riddles across NIT Bhopal, testing their problem-solving skills, teamwork, and resilience. The competition was intense, with treasure hunters striving for victory. The event celebrated the triumph of the sharpest minds and most resilient teams, highlighting the power of determination and collaboration. Anveshan'24 left participants with unforgettable memories and a testament to the spirit of adventure and relentless pursuit of knowledge. Congratulations to all who took part and made history.

eventDetails.title: Vihaan
eventDetails.content: Vihaan, an annual quizzing odyssey, captivates the minds of freshers with its ever-evolving thematic brilliance. Each year, this intellectual soiree transforms into a crucible of erudition and exhilaration, fostering a symbiotic blend of learning and merriment. Freshmen immerse themselves in a kaleidoscope of knowledge, navigating through intricate questions and enigmatic challenges. The culmination of their cerebral voyage is adorned with coveted prizes, bestowing honor upon the sagacious victors. Vihaan is not merely a competition; it is a rite of passage, an initiation into a world where curiosity reigns supreme and every participant emerges enriched and enlightened.

qna.question: What is Quizzers Club MANIT?
qna.answer: Quizzers Club MANIT is a student-run organization dedicated to promoting a quizzing culture within MANIT and across country. We organize regular quiz competitions and provide a platform for students to enhance their knowledge across various subjects.

qna.question: What are the events organized by the club?
qna.answer:
Quizzers' Club MANIT organize mainly five events: 
 • IQC - Inter-city Quizzing Competition, 
 • Abhigyan - Inter-College Quizzing Competition, 
 • Manthan - Inter-State Quizzing Competition, 
 • Anveshan- a treasure hunt event, 
 • Vihaan - A quiz contest for freshers.

qna.question: Who can join Quizzers' Club MANIT?
qna.answer: Students pursuing their graduation from MANIT can join as a official member of QCM.

qna.question: How to join Quizzers' Club NIT-Bhopal?
qna.answer: Every year at the end of the second semester, QCM conducts an annual recruitment drive for freshers. You can fill out the registration form, and if you make it through all of the Assessment Rounds, you will be selected to join the team!

qna.question: Who should I contact if I have more questions?
qna.answer: For any further queries, you can contact us through the contact form on our website, email us at quizzersclubmanit@gmail.com, or reach out to any of the club's executive members.

general.Eligibility: The quiz is open to all registered participants. Ensure you have registered before the deadline
general.Platform: The quiz will be conducted on QCM official website. Ensure you have a stable internet connection
general.Quiz Timing: The quiz will start promptly at [start time] on [date]. Ensure you are logged in and ready by this time
general.Total Duration: The total quiz duration is 40 minutes
